  • Method Details

    • getTriggersClassTest

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("monsterAndTriggers") public void getTriggersClassTest(monsters.Monster testMonster, monsters.Trigger[] testTriggers, main.Difficulty difficulty)
      Tests that getTriggers(Class) returns the correct triggers for each monster.
      Parameters:
      testMonster - The monster to get the triggers for.
      testTriggers - The expected triggers of the monster.
      difficulty - difficulty of triggers we are looking for, hard because we want all the triggers.

    • getTriggersDifficultyTest

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("monsterTriggersAndDifficulty") public void getTriggersDifficultyTest(monsters.Monster testMonster, monsters.Trigger[] testTriggers, main.Difficulty difficulty)
      Testing that the triggers for a monster changes based on difficulty.
      Parameters:
      testMonster - The monster to get the triggers for.
      testTriggers - The expected triggers of the monster at a given difficulty.
      difficulty - difficulty of triggers we are looking for.

    • getTriggersIllegalArgumentTest

      @Test public void getTriggersIllegalArgumentTest()
      Testing if an exception is thrown when an illegal class is passed as an argument into the method.
